page.title: 04PENTRE TRUSCOED FARM.
page.content: One of the pupils at the school,Stuart Thomas lives on this farm which is owned by his family. The farm is in the area covered by our grid at OS ref.02915 02093. The farm is worked by Mr.Thomas who is also a fulltime biochemist,Mrs Thomas,and with the help of the two boys aged 11 and 14. The details of the farm are; Acres 174. + grazing rights to Rhos Common and Great Forest,Brecknock Stock. 500 sheep. 4 horses. 5 working sheepdogs. Buildings 15 The house has 8 rooms and a cellar. The farm is very old being at least 450 years old.
